name: GetTeamStyles
description:
Retrieve a list of published team styles from Figma.

This tool retrieves a paginated list of styles published within a Figma team library. Use this to access and view styles that have been shared within a specific team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Figma team from which to list styles.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list styles from.

parameters.name: number_of_items
parameters.description: The number of items to return in a paginated list of results. Defaults to 30.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

parameters.name: styles_cursor_after
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving styles. Used for pagination. Exclusive with styles_cursor_before.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: start_retrieving_before_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which ID to start retrieving styles before. Cannot be used with 'start_retrieving_after_cursor'.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving styles for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Id of the team to list styles from.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list styles from.
